content: learn to crochet this mini radish amigurumi with this free and easy pattern this cute easy design is perfect for beginners and can be completed within an hour use any yarn you like create a small keychain sized radish with sport weight cotton yarn or make a larger plush version using super bulky chenille yarn the pattern includes a full video tutorial to guide you through making this adorable food amigurumi plushie keychain link to english written pattern https //www mariskavos nl/free-radish-crochet-pattern/ link to dutch written pattern https //www mariskavos nl/nl/gratis-radijs-knuffel-haakpatroon/ link to english video tutorial https //youtu be/-ny1qmo8_v0 link to dutch video tutorial https //youtu be/v8tnxmntmva
